title: Font ID help
content:
Hello!

I found that font and is gorgeous! anyone know which is?  
 [http://aleaesse.tumblr.com/post/36809621240](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015063508/http:/aleaesse.tumblr.com/post/36809621240 "http://aleaesse.tumblr.com/post/36809621240")

Thanks!!!
author: hardface

comments.content: [Chinotto](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015063508/http:/www.behance.net/gallery/PUF-Festival-Brand-Identity/5943693), bespoke typeface by Federico Landini and Jonathan Calugi exclusively done for PUF!™ Festival, somehow mixing influences from [Colophon fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015063508/http:/www.colophon-foundry.org/fonts) and Radim Peško's [Fugue](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015063508/http:/www.radimpesko.com/fonts/fugue).

DOPE! Thanks! Looks a little like Fugue: [http://www.radimpesko.com/fonts/fugue](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015063508/http:/www.radimpesko.com/fonts/fugue "http://www.radimpesko.com/fonts/fugue")  
Both are gorgeous.
